extendedInfo.description: Take an adventure around the world in COIN DOZER: WORLD TOUR!From those that brought you the wildly popular Coin Dozer, comes a twist on the classic game found in arcades and carnivals- Coin Dozer: World Tour! Travel to destinations such as China, Japan, and all over Europe, with more places to come!With Coin Dozer: World Tour, youâll experience the majesty of China by collecting ancient coins, snatching up colorful dragons, stockpiling exploding fireworks, and more! Watch your coins and prizes stack up as the fire-breathing dragons help push your treasures over the edge! But the fun doesnât stop there: pack your bags, grab your passport, and continue on your adventure by heading to the fun-filled country of Japan! Collect calming Bonsai trees, stock up on some delicious sushi, and amass a team of ninjas! Thatâs not all- go backpacking all over Europe, visiting different countries and sampling the culture! Donât let anything drop off the sides if you want this to be the best trip ever! Be sure to look out for special coins to boost your coin-collecting power! Coin Dozer: World Tour is fun for both kids and adults!Features:â© Colorful and vibrant 3D graphics!â© The best physics of any coin pusher game!â© Tons of prizes to collect and currently 3 regions to visit!â© Lots of special effects!â© A world constantly expanding, with more areas to be added soon!Check back soon for more updates!Try other games by Game Circus, such as Cookie Dozer, Paplinko, and Prize Claw!

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: Fun. Well thought out. Would enjoy also if more locations were added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its fun but..
reviews.comment: Its fun but it is making me mad. I am on level 85 i have collect everything but one sign. I have none of that sign. I have maxed out all of the tier bonuses except for the one. I cant unlock the dragons because i have never gotten the one sign prize.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very laggy.
reviews.comment: good game bit lags all the time.  still addicted bit very annoying.... please fix and rate higher. 2*
reviews.author: ant currie

reviews.comment: Coin Dozer World Tour like it but tired of it force closing ever time I play. Fix it an I will glady rate it higher
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ummmm no
reviews.comment: I can\'t even give this game a star it stinks I\'ll stick with the original because you can actually move the coins unlike this version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too long
reviews.comment: Waiting too long for coins, and too long to unlock other country.. overall is good. But people want to play not for a short time period (open the game,drop some coins for about 2 to 5 minutes then close the apps, that\'s not what I\'m expected). Considering to uninstall it..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: coindozer world tour
reviews.comment: just bought 2000 dozer dollars \302\24314.99 and they not appeared . emailing gamecircus doesn\'t work. rip off.  beware. from j harding
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugggh
reviews.comment: I had to turn my phone off because it was lagging and it deleted the game ugghh I was almost at level 50 I been playingfor weeks now
reviews.author: nakayla sanford

reviews.title: WTF is with the ads top and bottom
reviews.comment: Dear designers I can\'t see how many coins I have which is annoying. I can\'t pay to get rid of the ads (which I am truely tempted to do). So you have left me no choice but to uninstall.
reviews.author: Laura Jane

reviews.title: Owe me
reviews.comment: Adds keep popping up right when coin going to regenerate and I don\'t get coin.  Please fix.  And ya owe me like 20 coins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some very annoying ads
reviews.comment: Full screen ads keep coming up just when a coin should be regenerated so you don\'t get the coin.
reviews.author: Pepper Cat

reviews.title: What????
reviews.comment: I like all the other coin dozer games, but this one is very unrealistic.....coins will be 3/4 off the edge and still not fall.....what\'s up with that.....uninstalled!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: **UPDATE UR GAMES**
reviews.comment: UR GAMES ALL SAY WILL BE UPDATED IN A COUPLE OF WKS..HOW LONG IS A COUPLE OF WKS TO Y\'ALL?? AND COIN DOZER EUROPE IS A COMPLETE JOKE..I HAD 42 COINS AND ONLY GOT 6 COINS PUSHED TO THE BOTTOM CUZ ALL GO OFF IN THE WATER..I HAVE SPENT ALOT OF MONEY ON UR GAMES,I WILL NOT SPEND ANOTHER PENNY TIL THEY ARE UPDATED!! **UPDATE**UPDATE**UPDATE**UPDATE**UPDATE**UPDATE**UPDATE**UPDATE**UPDATE**

reviews.title: Please update :\'(
reviews.comment: I used to love this game but now every time a Rabbit or Dragon drops, they bounce right off the screen... where do they go? Because I can\'t collect them if they don\'t land on top of the coins...  Android OS 4.2.2 JellyBean

reviews.comment: Love this game... got a new phone and had to start all over ughh... but oh well its fun(:
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Be warned - don\'t buy coins
reviews.comment: Loved the Japan and China games and think they are the most interesting of all of the coin dozer games although they both have serious multi-tasking issues, especially when the coin walls are up. However, the Europe game is dreadful. It is frustratingly difficult to get anything to the end, the physics aren\'t anywhere near the standard of the others and it\'s almost impossible to get into a rhythm. If I wasn\'t such a stickler about seeing things through it would\'ve been uninstalled.
reviews.author: Sarah Carre

reviews.title: New Country Needed.
reviews.comment: When can we expect a new Country or region? I have 100% in both Japan and China and 97% in Europe. Would be great if we could have a new challenge! Great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: KEEPS CRASHING
reviews.comment: After force closing my Galaxy Tab 4 times in about 10 minutes, I decided to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hypnotic
reviews.comment: I have been sucked into the total awesomeness of the \"circus dozer\"!!! Addictive, fun, suspenseful, even intuitive!!!       100% props! Keep it coming!
reviews.author: Luke Miller
